reviews.subject: Data Structures and Algorithms
reviews.review: Dr. Carter is an amazing professor who explains concepts very clearly. The course was challenging, but she was always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Operating Systems
reviews.review: The course material was tough, but her lectures were very detailed and well-organized. Make sure to stay on top of the assignments.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable and engaging. He makes difficult topics easier to grasp. Homework assignments can be lengthy though.

reviews.subject: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: The lectures were good, but the exams were very difficult. Dr. Smith provides plenty of practice problems, which helped a lot.

reviews.subject: Classical Mechanics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very enthusiastic and explains the concepts clearly. Her passion for physics is contagious, and she encourages participation.

reviews.subject: Electromagnetism
reviews.review: Her lectures are well-structured, but the exams are tough. Make sure to review the materials and attend her review sessions.
